title: Rodemi
author: Rodemi
content: Hello, I am a newbie, I would like to know what is the difference between S17 and S17Pro? I compared these 2 hash boards, and I can't find any difference between them so far except that the S17Pro hash board has one more notch than the S17. Can someone tell me theirs are different?

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: If you talking about s17 and s17 pro they look the same but they are not totally the same if you check carefully the circuit and some parts are not the same if you want to compare them I think these two links below are worth reading. - Antminer S17 and Antminer s17 pro List of Spare Parts.Also, both of them have unique programs if you mix them it won't work.

comments.author: Rodemi
comments.body: Thanks for your explanation, it looks like the S17 Pro spare parts kit is more complete.

comments.author: Osama Maaz
comments.body: Its seems that the manufactures making energy efficient Acics miners and the pro version is one step forward the power consumption of simple S17 is about 2 094 W at normal mode efficacy of the s17 is 2094/53= 39.5j per hash and efficacy of s17pro is 1975x53=37.26j per hash .for the reference i give you a link where you can find more details about their differencesÂ https://www.bitcoinminershashrate.com/antminer-s17-vs-s17-pro/
